name: Snare drum Pro
description:
Play Snare drum Pro for fun, school or band practice it's your choice.
For the best sound experience plug your device into headphones or speakers with sub-woofer.
Playing music on pad or phone is cool and easy.

You can play Snare, Classic drum kit, Indian Naal drum or Japanese Taiko drums.

Features:
- Multi-touch / tap
- Real drum sounds
- Custom stage and drum kit creator
- Tune option
